Hellraiser's Slightly Faster Freezer Method
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: Hellraiser's Slightly Faster Freezer Method
By Hellraiser83 on Monday, August 26, 2002 - 01:55 am:

A variation of DPs method I designed when I wanted to go with all HDs without any life loss and didn't want to take so long quite as long.

The method follows a 2 month pattern. After the 2 months are done, repeat.

Month 1
week 1 - freeze
week 2 - frozen
week 3 - unfreeze, nuts oil, hard drill
week 4 - mint leaf, hard drill
food - tablet (liked)

Month 2
week 1 - freeze
week 2 - frozen
week 3 - frozen
week 4 - unfreeze, nuts oil, hard drill
food - tablet (liked)

It's that simple, and 50% faster. It may not seem like much, but if you're planning on doing it for a long time, I really suggest trying this instead. Just don't get your months mixed up.

By Hellraiser83 on Monday, August 26, 2002 - 01:59 am:

Math :

Month 1
frozen
frozen
NO 00 00
HD 15 12
ML 15 06
HD 30 18
TB 30 03

Month 2
frozen
frozen
frozen
NO 02 03
HD 17 15
TB 17 00

and next time around that first nuts oil does just like I put that it does, makes it 0 0.

By Hellraiser83 on Monday, September 2, 2002 - 07:31 pm:

New addition.
I have found a way to use this method when your monster only tolerates tablets. The problem...you have to be a HAD monster (see below).

Month 1
week 1 - freeze
week 2 - frozen
week 3 - unfreeze, nuts oil, hard drill
week 4 - nuts oil, hard drill
food - tablet (tolerated)

Month 2
week 1 - freeze
week 2 - frozen
week 3 - frozen
week 4 - unfreeze, mint leaf, hard drill
food - tablet (tolerated)

The HAD effect courtesy of Nevistar
Nuts Oil:

-28 Fatigue
-1/5 current Stress [round down] in monsters with Durahan,Henger, or ArrowHead main and/or subs
